item.title: MS Cybersecurity: My Journey from India to the U.S. 🎓🔐
item.description: A deep dive into my experience as an international student studying cybersecurity at UMBC, featured in Saman Fatima's podcast 'Off the Record with Saman - Student Abroad'.

item.title: Do you plan to pursue MS at UMBC, but worried if Baltimore is safe or not? 🎓🔐
item.description: Worried about safety in Baltimore as a student? Here's my personal take on living, studying, and thriving in the city.
